心配でならない: (しんぱいでならない) - can't help worrying; besides myself with worry
心配り: (こころくばり) - exerting care; attention; consideration; thoughtfulness
心配をかける: (しんぱいをかける) - to cause someone to worry
心配を掛ける: (しんぱいをかける) - to cause someone to worry
心配事: (しんぱいごと) - worries; cares; troubles
心配御無用: (しんぱいごむよう) - Don't worry about it; There is nothing to fear; There is no need for anxiety; Everything is under control
心配性: (しんぱいしょう) - prone to worrying
心配無用: (しんぱいむよう) - (yoji) Don't worry about it; There is nothing to fear; There is no need for anxiety; Everything is under control
心配要らない: (しんぱいいらない) - don't worry; there's no need to worry
心電計: (しんでんけい) - electrocardiograph; ECG; EKG
心霊: (しんれい) - spirit (e.g. human spirit)/soul; spirit/ghost/ethereal being
心霊スポット: (しんれいスポット) - location where spirits and ghosts allegedly often appear; haunted place
心霊写真: (しんれいしゃしん) - spirit photography; ghost photography
心霊学: (しんれいがく) - study of psychic phenomena; psychics
心霊手術: (しんれいしゅじゅつ) - psychic surgery
心霊現象: (しんれいげんしょう) - psychic phenomenon
心霊術: (しんれいじゅつ) - spiritualism; spiritualistic ability; ability to cause psychic phenomena
心静か: (こころしずか) - calm; serene; tranquil; peaceful
心頭滅却: (しんとうめっきゃく) - (yoji) clearing one's mind of all mundane thoughts
心願成就: (しんがんじょうじゅ) - (yoji) earnest prayers being answered; realization of one's earnest wishes
心髄: (しんずい) - marrow/pith; centre/center/nucleus/hub; bottom of one's heart
心魂: (しんこん) - heart and soul; one's soul (heart)
必す属性: (ひっすぞくせい) - mandatory attribute; required attribute
必す構成要素: (ひっすこうせいようそ) - mandatory (M) component
必ず: (kanarazu) - sempre, sem exceção, necessariamente, certamente, sem falta, positivamente, invariavelmente
必ずしも: (かならずしも) - (used with neg. verb) not always; not necessarily; not all; not entirely
必修科目: (ひっしゅうかもく) - compulsory subject
必勝不敗: (ひっしょうふはい) - (yoji) certain victory; sure victory; invincibility
必勝法: (ひっしょうほう) - surefire way to win
必携: (ひっけい) - handbook/manual/vade mecum; essential item/must-have
必携品: (ひっけいひん) - must-have; indispensable item; necessities
必死: (hisshi) - frantic, frenético, desesperado; morte inevitável, frantic, frenético, desesperado; morte inevitável; brinkmate (xeque-mate inevitável)
必死になって: (ひっしになって) - desperately; for one's dear life
必殺: (ひっさつ) - bringing certain death; deadly; knockout (blow)
必殺技: (ひっさつわざ) - killer technique/surefire assassination method; special or lethal move, usu. one unique to a certain fighter or fighting style
必治薬: (ひっちやく) - necessity guaranteed to cure
必用: (ひつよう) - (必用 can imply has to be used rather than is just needed) necessary/needed/essential/indispensable; necessity/need/requirement
必着: (ひっちゃく) - must arrive; must be received
必置: (ひっち) - mandatory requirements (e.g. qualifications, administrative structures, etc.)
必置規制: (ひっちきせい) - government rules on structure, staffing, etc. of local bodies (e.g. police force)
必衰: (ひっすい) - bound to decline, decay, or collapse
必要とする: (ひつようとする) - to need; to call for; to require
必要と認める: (ひつようとみとめる) - to judge as necessary
必要に応じて: (ひつようにおうじて) - as necessary
必要は発明の母: (ひつようははつめいのはは) - necessity is the mother of invention
必要メモリ: (ひつようメモリ) - required memory size
必要不可欠: (ひつようふかけつ) - essential; indispensable; imperative; necessary; compelling, vital, critical
必要動作環境: (ひつようどうさかんきょう) - (minimum) system requirements
必要十分条件: (ひつようじゅうぶんじょうけん) - necessary and sufficient condition
必要書類: (ひつようしょるい) - necessary documents; important documents
必要条件: (ひつようじょうけん) - (yoji)  necessary condition; requirement
必要次第: (ひつようしだい) - (yoji) as necessary (needed); if necessary (needed)
必見: (ひっけん) - must-see; not to be missed; a must
必読書: (ひつどくしょ) - must-read (book); required reading
必達: (ひったつ) - (from 必ず達成する) certain fulfilment
必需品: (ひつじゅひん) - necessities; necessary article; requisite; essentials; staple
必須: (hissu) - indispensável, essencial, necessário, exigido, obrigatório, preciso
必須アミノ酸: (ひっすアミノさん) - essential amino acid
必須入力: (ひっすにゅうりょく) - required entry (e.g. in online forms)
必須条件: (ひっすじょうけん) - (yoji) essential condition
必須科目: (ひっすかもく) - required subject; compulsory course
必須脂肪酸: (ひっすしぼうさん) - essential fatty acid
